code: import{LOGIN_REQUEST,LOGIN_SUCCESS,LOGIN_FAIL,LOGOUT,SIGNUP_REQUEST,SIGNUP_SUCCESS,SIGNUP_FAIL}from'../types';const initialState={user:null,loading:false,error:null};const authReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case LOGIN_REQUEST:case SIGNUP_REQUEST:return{...state,loading:true,error:null};case LOGIN_SUCCESS:case SIGNUP_SUCCESS:return{...state,loading:false,user:action.payload};case LOGIN_FAIL:case SIGNUP_FAIL:return{...state,loading:false,error:action.payload};case LOGOUT:return{...state,user:null};default:return state;}};export default authReducer;
